project_abstract.cdata: The Yixing Pumped Storage Project for China's development objective is to increase the overall efficiency of the power sector in Jiangsu Province in two ways: a) design and implementation of a restructuring of the power sector to further competition at the generation level and to provide large consumers access to generators, and b) construction of a pumped storage plant (4 x 250 MW) in Yixing to ease acute peaking problems and improve the generation mix that will create the conditions for more flexible dispatch and improved supply reliability an essential requirement for well-functioning competitive markets. The project components are: 1) construction of the Yinxing pumped storage power plant, a new upper reservoir, new main dam and subsidiary dam, and the underground powerhouse; 2) assistance to the restructuring of the power sector; and 3) construction of a double circuit transmission line to connect the Yixing pumped storage plant to the East China 500 KV network. The project will contribute to the Bank's energy sector strategy for China by assisting in making a smooth transition from a fully state-owned monopolistic sector to a diversely owned, market-oriented sector in which are promoted clean fuels, renewable energy, energy efficiency and assistance to poor western areas to develop their energy resources for local growth and export to other regions.

P068058.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>宜兴抽水蓄能项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目将在宜兴建设一座抽水蓄能电站（4x25万千瓦），以缓解调峰压力，改善发电组合电源结构，提高电网运行的灵活性和可靠性，同时为发电侧竞价上网提供条件。为实现更灵活的调配，改善供电稳定性创造条件，也是竞争性市场良好运转的重要要求。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
